name: Steel Nemesis Demo
description:
- THE GAME IS OVER 100 MBS BECAUSE OF THE SOUNDTRACK - IT WILL PROBABLY NEED TO DOWNLOAD FOR A WHILE -

If the game doesn't fit your browser, you'll have to resize the webpage.

This is a remake of my old school project.

This is just a demo, many features are still missing and are yet to be implemented - altough I don't know when they will be. I would like to release this game later for free too (with a standalone offline desktop steam release for a few bucks).

Donates are highly appreciated since I just entered college and I am doing my projects for free instead of homework lol, so some kind of financial motivator would be great, otherwise I will just work my ass off without anything in return.

Even if you do not want to donate anything - thank you for playing, still. Don't forget to leave a comment if something weird happens that you think might be a bug - I haven't done that much of playtesting. I will try to add features even to this demo, but I don't know how often that'll be.

Controls, Tutorial, etc. are displayed in the game's "How to play" section. Thank you for stopping by.

This project was inspired by Space Invaders and sort-of Binding of Isaac.

Music used is by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
